name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Propulsion Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

lessons.name: Combustion Processes
lessons.description: Understanding combustion processes and efficiency.

lessons.name: Combustion Instability
lessons.description: Understanding combustion instability and mitigation.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Performance
lessons.description: Understanding nozzle performance and efficiency.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

lessons.name: Introduction to Aerodynamics
lessons.description: Overview of the fundamental principles of aerodynamics.

lessons.name: Airfoil and Wing Design
lessons.description: Understanding airfoil shapes and their impact on lift and drag.

lessons.name: Lift and Drag Forces
lessons.description: In-depth study of lift and drag forces acting on aircraft.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

lessons.name: Subsonic Flow Principles
lessons.description: Detailed analysis of subsonic airflow.

lessons.name: Supersonic Flow Principles
lessons.description: Understanding the dynamics of supersonic airflow.

lessons.name: Shock Waves and Expansion Waves
lessons.description: Study of shock and expansion waves in high-speed aerodynamics.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

lessons.name: Aerodynamic Heating Fundamentals
lessons.description: Introduction to the causes and effects of aerodynamic heating.

lessons.name: Thermal Protection Systems
lessons.description: Overview of systems used to protect spacecraft from heat.

lessons.name: Heat Transfer Mechanisms
lessons.description: In-depth study of conduction, convection, and radiation in aerodynamics.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

lessons.name: Spacecraft Materials
lessons.description: Overview of materials used in spacecraft construction.

lessons.name: Structural Load Analysis
lessons.description: Understanding the impact of various loads on spacecraft structures.

lessons.name: Vibration and Fatigue in Spacecraft
lessons.description: Study of vibration and fatigue issues in spacecraft structural design.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

lessons.name: Kepler's Laws of Orbital Motion
lessons.description: Fundamentals of orbital mechanics using Kepler's laws.

lessons.name: Orbital Maneuvers
lessons.description: Techniques and strategies for orbital changes and maneuvers.

lessons.name: Mission Planning and Control
lessons.description: Basics of planning and controlling space missions.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

lessons.name: Power Systems
lessons.description: Design and analysis of spacecraft power systems.

lessons.name: Thermal Control Systems
lessons.description: Study of thermal management systems in spacecraft.

lessons.name: Payload Integration
lessons.description: Understanding payload design and integration into spacecraft systems.

name: Introduction to Organic Chemistry
description: Basic concepts of organic chemistry, including hydrocarbons and functional groups.

lessons.name: Hydrocarbons
lessons.description: Overview of the types and properties of hydrocarbons.

lessons.name: Functional Groups
lessons.description: Introduction to functional groups and their reactivity.

lessons.name: Organic Synthesis
lessons.description: Basics of synthesizing organic compounds.

name: Stereochemistry
description: Introduction to stereochemistry and its role in organic reactions.

lessons.name: Chirality and Enantiomers
lessons.description: Understanding chirality and stereoisomers.

lessons.name: Optical Activity
lessons.description: Study of optical activity and its applications.

lessons.name: Diastereomers
lessons.description: In-depth analysis of diastereomers and their properties.

name: Reactions and Mechanisms
description: Study of organic reactions and their mechanisms.

lessons.name: Substitution Reactions
lessons.description: Overview of nucleophilic and electrophilic substitution reactions.

lessons.name: Elimination Reactions
lessons.description: Detailed study of elimination reactions and mechanisms.

lessons.name: Reaction Kinetics
lessons.description: Understanding the kinetics of organic reactions.

name: Introduction to Inorganic Chemistry
description: Basic principles of inorganic chemistry and bonding theories.

lessons.name: Atomic Structure and Bonding
lessons.description: Overview of atomic structure and various types of bonding in inorganic compounds.

lessons.name: Ionic Compounds and Lattice Energy
lessons.description: Understanding ionic compounds and the concept of lattice energy.

lessons.name: Molecular Orbitals in Inorganic Chemistry
lessons.description: Introduction to molecular orbital theory as applied to inorganic compounds.

name: Coordination Chemistry
description: Principles of coordination chemistry, metal complexes, and bonding theories.

lessons.name: Coordination Compounds and Nomenclature
lessons.description: Overview of coordination compounds, nomenclature, and geometries.

lessons.name: Ligand Field Theory
lessons.description: Introduction to ligand field theory and its applications in coordination chemistry.

lessons.name: Isomerism in Coordination Compounds
lessons.description: Study of isomerism in coordination complexes and its significance.

name: Transition Metal Chemistry
description: Advanced study of transition metals and their role in inorganic chemistry.

lessons.name: Electronic Configuration of Transition Metals
lessons.description: Exploring the electronic configuration and properties of transition metals.

lessons.name: Catalysis by Transition Metals
lessons.description: Understanding how transition metals function as catalysts in various reactions.

lessons.name: Bioinorganic Chemistry
lessons.description: Study of the role of transition metals in biological systems.

name: Introduction to Physical Chemistry
description: Basic principles of physical chemistry, including thermodynamics and kinetics.

lessons.name: Thermodynamics
lessons.description: Introduction to the laws of thermodynamics and their applications.

lessons.name: Kinetics
lessons.description: Study of the rates of chemical reactions and factors affecting them.

lessons.name: Quantum Mechanics
lessons.description: Overview of quantum mechanics principles in physical chemistry.

description: Introduction to the use of spectroscopy to determine molecular structure.

lessons.name: Infrared Spectroscopy
lessons.description: Study of infrared spectroscopy and its applications in molecular analysis.

lessons.name: Nuclear Magnetic Resonance (NMR)
lessons.description: Introduction to NMR spectroscopy and its use in structure determination.

lessons.name: Mass Spectrometry
lessons.description: Overview of mass spectrometry and its applications in chemistry.

name: Advanced Physical Chemistry
description: Advanced topics in physical chemistry including statistical mechanics and surface chemistry.

lessons.name: Statistical Mechanics
lessons.description: Introduction to statistical mechanics and its applications in chemistry.

lessons.name: Surface Chemistry
lessons.description: Study of surface chemistry and its importance in catalysis.

lessons.name: Electrochemistry
lessons.description: Overview of electrochemistry and its applications in physical chemistry.
